title: An Act relative to the fiduciary responsibility of lenders for non-payment of insurance premiums from escrowed accounts

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Montigny, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 794) of Mark C. Montigny for legislation relative to the fiduciary responsibility of lenders for non-payment of insurance premiums from escrowed accounts.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
Hearing scheduled for 10/07/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/07/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:10 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                    and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
